public boolean nonWild()

this is what ihave now

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747  && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794  && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764  && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793  && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773  && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766  && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751  && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764  && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785  && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771  && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732  && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789  && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861  && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186  && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=2579  && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841  && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887  && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939  && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742  && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146  && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692  && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690  && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446  && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878  && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 )||
heightLevel == 1)

else
return false;
}
